incentives.description: Fuel economy inputs for IE my

extra_copy.content: * Costs above include potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
All prices are shown without potential incentives or gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
* Prices shown include the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
Prices shown without the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
Tesla vehicles are A rated for energy consumption.

props.classes: tds-text--h6 tds-text--start text-loader--subtitle tds-text--500 tds-text_color--30 tds--vertical_padding-10

extra_copy.content: All cars have premium interior and sound

The WLTP standard can be useful in comparing ranges among electric vehicles. Ranges listed as “estimate” or “est.”, like those under wheel and seating selections, if available, are estimations based on your chosen configuration.

Actual range may vary based on factors such as speed, weather conditions and elevation change.

An exclusive protection feature called Sentry Mode continuously monitors the vehicle's surroundings when you leave your Tesla unattended. When activated, Sentry Mode arms and uses the vehicle's external cameras to detect and help protect against potential threats, similar to home alarm systems.

View Owners Manual for additional information.
Exclusive gray wheels designed with lightweight, yet tough aluminum alloy for ultimate driving control both on and off the track.
Larger, stiffer calipers and lightweight two-piece discs for enhanced performance and thermal capacity.
Designed with aluminum alloy for enhanced interior styling.
For enhanced aerodynamics and improved stability at high speeds.
Optimize on-track performance and handling with highly adaptive motor torque control, increased regenerative braking, increased powertrain cooling and enhanced cornering power.

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display.  Model Y will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you while driving under 24 km/h.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.
Tesla-designed silicon optimised for computer vision enables detailed, onscreen environment visualisation and eventual Full Self-Driving Capability through over-the-air software updates.

Included with every Tesla, Autopilot enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. Advanced safety and convenience features are designed to assist you with the most burdensome parts of driving, alongside driver assistance features such as emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.

Access everything on the expansive 15-inch touchscreen including high-definition side and rearview camera views, navigation, movies, music, games and more. Your surroundings are visualised in real time while you drive to display speed limit signs, upcoming traffic control signals, pedestrians, cyclists and hazards in a 360-degree surround view.
Model Y gets better over time with frequent wireless software updates, bringing you new features, more entertainment, higher performance and range, increased comfort and even better safety.

Charge anywhere there is electricity. Most range used for daily driving can be topped off using the Mobile Connector Bundle and an approved outlet, or upgrade to a Tesla Wall Connector for the best home charging experience. For long distance travel, Model Y adds up to 241 kilometres of range in just 15 minutes using Tesla’s Supercharger network, getting you back on the road, sooner.
Remotely control and monitor your Tesla with Phone Key keyless driving, range & charging status, climate control, live GPS location and more.

The expansive Glass Roof provides passengers with a brighter, more spacious experience and a seamless view of the sky. Infrared and ultraviolet light is effectively blocked before entering the cabin, reducing heat and glare even when the sun is directly overhead.

Each rear seat can independently fold for maximum versatility. The 2nd row automatically folds using the rear hatch controls, and rear passengers can adjust and recline their seatback for  added comfort.

Easily charge two phones at once on a non-slip, contoured surface. The integrated centre console offers deep storage space with two front and two rear USB-C charging ports and tiered storage under the armrest.

Softer than leather, yet far more durable and more stain-resistant, our custom-engineered seating material is fully vegan and significantly more sustainable than traditional seating materials, maximising comfort and aesthetics while maintaining our rigorous standards for durability and stain resistance.

Airflow and temperature are controlled entirely through the display, allowing precise direction without ever seeing or touching a physical vent. On hot days, Cabin Overheat Protection ensures interiors always stay cool, and our HEPA filtration system delivers the best possible cabin air quality. In cold weather, pre-conditioning automatically warms the cabin, prepares the car’s battery to maximise range and efficiency.

Tesla designed Model Y from the ground-up as an electric vehicle using system-level integration throughout. Each component, including batteries, motors and even exterior aerodynamics are optimised to benefit from one another and create one of the most efficient, yet unbelievably powerful vehicles ever built.
Premium audio with 13 speakers, 1 subwoofer, 2 amps and immersive sound
Heated seats for all 5 seats with individual controls
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Wireless phone charging in center console
1.9m³ of cargo space including a secure front trunk
Emergency lane departure avoidance and correction
Model Y includes Navigation standard and a 30 day Premium Connectivity trial enabling:
Video Streaming, allowing access to content from Netflix, Youtube, Twitch, and more
Premium audio – 13 speakers, 1 subwoofer, 2 amps, and immersive sound
USB-A port in the glovebox with a 128GB portable storage device included
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Power folding, auto-dimming, heated side mirrors
Center console with storage, 4 USB-C ports and wireless charging for 2 smartphones

Model Y provides maximum versatility – able to carry 7 passengers and their cargo. Each rear seat folds flat independently, creating flexible storage for skis, furniture, luggage and more. The liftgate opens to a low trunk floor that makes loading and unloading easy and quick.

Model Y features 2158 litres of cargo space accessible through both the front trunk and the automatically opening and closing rear trunk. Taking advantage of the space traditionally occupied by bulky engines, gas tanks and transmissions, the design of Model Y enables disproportionately large amounts of storage for a car its size, while bolstering occupant safety through a more spacious, reinforced body and chassis.

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model Y will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.

groups.name: Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

extra_copy.content: Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control is designed to slowdown and stop for visible traffic lights or stop signs that are detected when Traffic-Aware Cruise Control or Autosteer is engaged.
Features subject to change and may vary based on hardware configuration. New features that become available after delivery may be subject to additional charges.
* Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, for 8 years following the new vehicle’s original delivery. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 30 days, then available as a subscription

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, until {sc-duration}. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 30 days, then available as a subscription.

props.classes: tds-text--h6 tds-text--start text-loader--subtitle tds-text--500 tds-text_color--30 tds--vertical_padding-10

extra_copy.content: Enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane.

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
All functionality of Basic Autopilot and Enhanced Autopilot
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. Some features require turn signals and are limited in range. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
Autopilot is a pre-requite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability; after you purchase Autopilot, your vehicle will be eligible for the Full Self-Driving Capability subscription.
A Full Self-Driving computer installation of ##cost## is required. Once the installation is complete, you will be eligible to subscribe.

By ##ACTION##, your saved payment method will be charged and auto-billed monthly. To learn more visit ##termsAndConditions##.

Full Self-Driving Capability Subscription can be cancelled anytime, however, they cannot be refunded. To learn more visit ##cancellationPolicy##.

If applicable, tax is calculated based on the address provided while placing an order.

The current Full Self-Driving features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The future use of these features without supervision is dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions.
Larger, stiffer calipers and lightweight two-piece discs for enhanced performance and thermal capacity
when all-wheel drive and standard battery options becomes available.

Our motors are efficient and frictionless with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Model Y has two of these independent motors for improved redundancy and, unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels for far better handling and traction control.
Improve your 0-100 km/h acceleration from 5.0 seconds to 4.4 seconds.

$MDLY.name: Model Y
$MDLY.description: Deliveries are beginning in the US based on date of order and options selected.

extra_copy.content: Learn More about Model Y deliveries
Designed with aluminum alloy for enhanced interior styling
Carbon fiber spoiler and Dual Motor badge available for installation after your delivery
For enhanced aerodynamics and improved stability at high speeds
High strength, Class II steel tow bar capable of towing up to 1,600 kg

$MTY09.name: Long Range All-Wheel Drive
$MTY09.long_name: Model Y Long Range Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive

extra_copy.content: Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors for improved redundancy, each with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels for far better handling and traction control.
Model Y Long Range Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive

$MTY12.name: Performance All-Wheel Drive
$MTY12.long_name: Model Y Performance Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive

extra_copy.content: Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors for improved redundancy, each with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels for far better handling and traction control.
Model Y Performance Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive

$PRMY1.name: Premium Interior
$PRMY1.description:
Upgrade your interior with additional features and premium materials.

  • Premium heated seating and cabin materials throughout, including open pore wood décor, glass roof and four USB ports
  • 12-way power adjustable front seats, steering column and side mirrors, with custom driver profiles
  • Premium audio system with more power, tweeters, surround speakers and subwoofer

extra_copy.content: Our premium package adds upgraded features throughout Model Y
Increased top speed from 217 km/h to 250 km/h
Fold-flat second row for maximum cargo storage

warnings.message: 'Fees' should be moved to Copy lexicon from Options.

en.default:
Tesla {SELECTED_TRIM_LONG_NAME} - PCP Representative Example | {TERM} fixed monthly payments of {PAYMENT} | On-the-road cash price {CASH_PRICE} | Customer deposit {DOWNPAYMENT} | Total amount of credit {FINANCED_AMOUNT} | Optional Final Payment {RESIDUAL_VALUE} | Interest charges {INTEREST_CHARGES} | Total amount payable {TOTAL_AMOUNT_PAYABLE} | Annual Percentage Rate {RATE}%

Finance offers in Ireland are provided by Finance Ireland Motor & Leasing. The finance offer is a hire agreement (hire purchase or personal contract purchase) aimed exclusively at personal customers.

Finance Ireland Credit Solutions Designated Activity Company trading as Finance Ireland Motor & Leasing is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. Financing is available directly with Finance Ireland and through approved Tesla stores in Ireland. Offers are based on {RATE}% APR. This is a mutually exclusive offer and cannot be combined with any other offer that may apply. Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply.

Total amount repayable incl. VAT {TOTAL_AMOUNT_PAYABLE}

This product is provided by Merrion Fleet Management Limited T/a ALD Automotive, 15/16 Holly Avenue, Stillorgan Industrial Park, Stillorgan, Co Dublin A94 XA72. (Registered in Ireland, company registration number 317799) and is for Consumers only.

This is a full service leasing agreement and you will not own the vehicle at the end of the lease. The vehicle remains the property of the owner.

The agreement includes a full maintenance package and is based over a 3 or 4 year term and fixed mileage per annum. Quotations are based on 3 rentals up front followed by 33 monthly rentals (when a 36 month term is selected) or 45 monthly rentals (when a 48 month term is selected). The prices quoted include VAT (Current VAT rate is 23%). The maintenance package includes annual road tax, vehicle servicing, tyre replacement under normal wear & tear and Roadside Assist. Vehicles must be returned in good condition and within agreement mileage, otherwise further charges will be incurred. It is recommended to read the full contract conditions. A documentation fee of € 123 including VAT (€ 100 plus VAT @ 23%) is charged with your first regular monthly rental.

The finance information is for illustrative purposes only and does not constitute an offer. Finance is subject to credit approval. Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply.

This product is a full service lease (contract hire) agreement offered by ALD to corporate clients without a purchase option. This full service lease product is supplied by Merrion Fleet Management Limited t/a ALD Automotive, 15/16 Holly Avenue, Stillorgan Industrial Park, Stillorgan, Co Dublin. The full service lease agreement is between the customer and ALD Automotive. The prices quoted exclude VAT for business clients. Pricing is subject to change in the event of change in list prices, taxes or cost of funds. The services included lease, replacement Tyres (changed under our fair wear and tear agreement), Maintenance, Road Tax , breakdown assistance and replacement vehicle for the duration of the contract (corporate only). Each contract requires 3 upfront monthly payments with the benefit to the customer being there are no monthly payments for the last 3 months of the contract. The contract is set to an agreed mileage with additional charges for excess mileage. This is a fixed term rental agreement. At no time will you own the vehicle. All offers are subject to credit approval and ‘know your customer’ analysis. It is recommended to read the full contract conditions before subscribing to it.

The finance information provided is for illustrative purposes only and does not constitute a contract. Customers interested in financing their Tesla will be referred to Tesla’s approved partner for official quotes and to submit a credit application. Finance figures shown are based on a Hire Purchase contract and current offered rate of {RATE}% APR.

Finance offers in Ireland are provided by Finance Ireland Motor & Leasing. The finance offer is a hire agreement (hire purchase or personal contract purchase) Finance Ireland Credit Solutions Designated Activity Company trading as Finance Ireland Motor & Leasing is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. Financing is available directly with Finance Ireland and through approved Tesla stores in Ireland. Offers are based on {RATE}% APR. This is a mutually exclusive offer and cannot be combined with any other offer that may apply. Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply.
